comment: The union ` U ` of two (undirected) hypergraphs ` G ` and ` H ` with the same vertex set ` V ` is a hypergraph with the vertex ` V ` and the union ` ( E u. F ) ` of the (indexed) edges. (Contributed by AV, 11-Oct-2020.) (Revised by AV, 24-Oct-2021.)
